scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd shared && npm run dev" "react-scripts start"
scripts.update-types: cd shared && npm run build && npm pack --pack-destination ../functions && cd ../functions && npm install ./wedding-plan-types-1.0.0.tgz
scripts.deploy:dev: cd shared && npm run build && cd .. && npm run build:dev && firebase use wedding-c89a1 && firebase deploy --only hosting:development
scripts.deploy:prod: cd shared && npm run build && cd .. && npm run build:prod && firebase use wedding-prod-f13a0 && firebase deploy --only hosting:production -P production
scripts.deploy:functions:prod: cd shared && npm run build && npm pack --pack-destination ../functions && cd ../functions && npm install ./wedding-plan-types-1.0.0.tgz && npm run build && firebase use wedding-prod-f13a0 && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy:prod:both: cd shared && npm run build && npm pack --pack-destination ../functions && cd ../functions && npm install ./wedding-plan-types-1.0.0.tgz && cd .. && npm run build:prod && cd functions && npm run build && cd .. && firebase deploy --only hosting:production,functions -P production
scripts.deploy:dev:both: cd shared && npm run build && npm pack --pack-destination ../functions && cd ../functions && npm install ./wedding-plan-types-1.0.0.tgz && cd .. && npm run build:dev && cd functions && npm run build && cd .. && firebase use wedding-c89a1 && firebase deploy --only hosting:development,functions -P development
